column4: When I boot my system, it says the filesystem has errors and that I should run fsck manually. When I boot into the LiveCD and run fsck, it says this: http://www.nomorepasting.com/getpaste.php?pasteid=32522
boot back into your native system, and type "sudo touch /forcecheck" without the quotes, of course
It won't let me boot. It's gets stuck.
